sectionText: A two-part capstone course in new media art practice. Students will explore current issues in New Media with the goal of understanding their own artwork in a disciplinary context. Students are expected to participate through: 1) the presentation of students' creative projects for the purposes of critique and discussion 2) the presentation and discussion of historic art works and theoretical texts. A primary goal of the course is to synthesize an understanding of new media art from relevant professional, historical and theoretical perspectives.
